net.marfgamer.jraknet.client

Class RakNetClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.RakNetClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.RakNetClientListener, net.marfgamer.jraknet.session.UnumRakNetPeer

    public class RakNetClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.marfgamer.jraknet.session.UnumRakNetPeer, net.marfgamer.jraknet.client.RakNetClientListener
    This class is used to connection to servers using the RakNet protocol
    Author:
    MarfGamer
